name: RescanMyTV
0:
”Alexa, open rescan my t.v.”
”Alexa, launch rescan my t.v.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rescan my t.v.
des: “Rescan My TV” is an informational voice app that assists users in rescanning their TVs to receive over-the-air signals. Due to congressional mandate, nearly 1,000 television stations that broadcast over the air are changing their frequencies, which will require viewers who receive broadcast TV channels over the air to rescan or retune their TVs in order to continue receiving these channels. This voice app educates users on rescanning their TVs via a step-by-step process.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
